the_warlord:Rebuff.NAME: Rebuff
the_warlord:Rebuff.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! block. NL Gain !M! the_warlord:Reaction Time.

the_warlord:HighReward.NAME: High Reward
the_warlord:HighReward.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Strength. NL Gain !M! Dexterity. NL Exhaust.

the_warlord:Syrette.NAME: Syrette
the_warlord:Syrette.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Gain !M! Dexterity. NL At the end of this turn, lose !M! Dexterity. NL Exhaust.

the_warlord:NeckSlash.NAME: Neck Slash
the_warlord:NeckSlash.DESCRIPTION: Apply the_warlord:Gush and !M! the_warlord:Bleed to a random enemy.

the_warlord:WideSwipes.NAME: Wide Swipes
the_warlord:WideSwipes.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies !M! times.

the_warlord:MeFirst.NAME: Me First
the_warlord:MeFirst.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage if enemy is attacking.

the_warlord:FinishOff.NAME: Finish Off
the_warlord:FinishOff.DESCRIPTION: Your attacks deal double damage this turn. NL the_warlord:Purge.
the_warlord:FinishOff.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Your attacks deal double damage this turn. NL Apply !M! Vulnerable to ALL enemies. NL the_warlord:Purge.

the_warlord:ZigZag.NAME: Zig Zag
the_warlord:ZigZag.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! block for each enemy in combat.

the_warlord:Fracture.NAME: Fracture
the_warlord:Fracture.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If enemy has block, this deals double damage.

the_warlord:Phalanx.NAME: Phalanx
the_warlord:Phalanx.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! block X times. NL Gain X Thorns. NL Exhaust.

the_warlord:Wrap.NAME: Wrap
the_warlord:Wrap.DESCRIPTION: ALL enemies lose !M! Strength this turn.

the_warlord:HitNRun.NAME: Hit 'n Run
the_warlord:HitNRun.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Next turn, gain !B! block.

the_warlord:StunNeedle.NAME: Stun Needle
the_warlord:StunNeedle.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Enemy loses !M! Strength. NL Exhaust.

the_warlord:Headlong.NAME: Headlong
the_warlord:Headlong.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL Draw !the_warlord:UrMagic! fewer card next turn.

the_warlord:SupportingFire.NAME: Supporting Fire
the_warlord:SupportingFire.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, deal !M! damage to ALL enemies. NL This damage is increased by your Strength.

the_warlord:Scout.NAME: Scout
the_warlord:Scout.DESCRIPTION: If this is the first card played this turn, draw !M! cards.

the_warlord:DecisiveFactor.NAME: Decisive Factor
the_warlord:DecisiveFactor.DESCRIPTION: Upgrade a card in your hand for the rest of combat.
the_warlord:DecisiveFactor.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Upgrade all cards in your hand for the rest of combat.

the_warlord:TakeShelter.NAME: Take Shelter
the_warlord:TakeShelter.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Next turn, add a Syrette to your hand.
the_warlord:TakeShelter.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Next !M! turns, add a Syrette to your hand.
